interestingFact: China has the world's largest high-speed rail network, covering over 38,000 kilometers.
India is home to the world's second-largest film industry, known as Bollywood, producing over 1,000 films annually.
The U.S. has the largest economy in the world, driven by a diverse range of industries.
Indonesia is the world's largest archipelago, consisting of over 17,000 islands.
Pakistan is home to the world's second-highest mountain, K2, which is part of the Karakoram range.
Nigeria has the largest economy in Africa, largely driven by oil production and agriculture.
Brazil is famous for the Amazon Rainforest, which is the largest tropical rainforest in the world.
Bangladesh is known for its rich cultural heritage, particularly in textiles, being one of the largest garment exporters in the world.
Russia is the largest country in the world by land area, spanning 11 time zones.
Mexico City is built on the ruins of Tenochtitlan, the ancient capital of the Aztec Empire.
